title.rendered: St Mary’s Marianhill Nursing School Application 2025 | Apply Now

content.rendered:
St Mary’s Marianhill Nursing School Application 2025, How to register online for St Mary’s Marianhill Nursing School 2025,  St Mary’s Marianhill Nursing School courses, Fees, Prospectus

 

An online admission application and registration form/dates for the 2025 academic year has been released by the management of the St Mary’s Marianhill Nursing School.

St Mary’s Marianhill Nursing School online application ongoing;

  • First-time applicants to St Mary’s Marianhill Nursing School
  • New qualifications and/or specializations for students
  • Candidates who applied for admission but were not offered a space or who were offered a space and took it but did not register
  • A student who completes a higher certificate or any other programme and wishes to continue with further undergraduate studies

How to Register Online for St Mary’s Marianhill Nursing School Application 2025

For St Mary’s Marianhill Nursing School Online Registration, you will need the following items:

  • A valid email account
  • The South Africa identification number
  • Students from abroad need a passport

Please CLICK HERE to register for St Mary’s Marianhill Nursing School 2025

Apply Now.
